channel.title: PI (Project Insanity) Hp Bar Rolls over!
channel.description:
Hey mopar, I download hybrid pk source a few days ago... and well when theres a creature with high hp over 100 the hp turns back to green asif its got full health again... Im wondering if any one has a fix for this? and im not sure if its client sided or server sided so i just posted in client sided since thats where im thinking :P
PLEASE HELP!!
